page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: { CROWN The Crown is a public house,situated at the west end of church street on fitzwilliam street,It is built over a well.the present landlaidy is Mrs Carter.The Crown Sells over 200 gallons of beer as well as a Wide Selection of other lagers,wines,and spirits.Bar meals are available.The Crown is said to be haunted by the ghost of a woman with old fashioned curling pins in her hair. { LOCAL HISTORY { FLOWER MILL Was built by Earl Fitzwilliam in June 1842 providing for the village as well as national distribution. But sadly was closed as uneconomic in spring 1985.
